verbose_text: To generate the pLenti.pur/Stas RNAi lentiviral vector, a fragment comprising the shRNA cassette under the control of a tetracyline regulated H1 TO promoter and the puromycin resistance gene driven by the PGK promoter were excised from pSUPERIOR.puro and cloned into a modified pRRLSIN.cPPT.PGK-GFP.WPRE vector (Addgene plasmid 12252) lacking the PGK-GFP cassette as a backbone.
evidence: puromycin resistance gene driven by the PGK
